articles.title: NASA Releases Stunning Video Of Jupiter Captured By Juno Spacecraft - NDTV
articles.description: American space agency NASA (National Aeronautics and Space Administration) never fails to amaze us with their updates. Now, the Jet Propulsion Laboratory of NASA has shared a video on Instagram which gives a glimpse of gas giant Jupiter.
articles.content:
NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory has shared a glimpse of gas giant Jupiter.
